environmentVariables.description: The transport protocol to use for communication with the MCP server.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_TRANSPORT

environmentVariables.description: The flag that indicates whether the MCP server should use meta tools.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_DYNAMIC

environmentVariables.description: The list of toolsets to enable for the MCP server.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_TOOLSETS

environmentVariables.description: The list of tools to enable for the MCP server.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_ENABLED_TOOLS

environmentVariables.description: The list of tools to disable for the MCP server.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_DISABLED_TOOLS

environmentVariables.description: The time-to-live (TTL) for HTTP sessions in milliseconds.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SESSION_TTL

environmentVariables.description: The interval for checking HTTP sessions for expiration in milliseconds.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SESSION_INTERVAL

environmentVariables.description: The user agent to include in the User-Agent header for API requests.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_USER_AGENT

environmentVariables.description: The base URL of the DocSpace instance for API requests.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_BASE_URL

environmentVariables.description: The raw value to include in the Authorization header for API requests.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_AUTHORIZATION

environmentVariables.description: The API key for accessing the API.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: The Personal Access Token (PAT) for accessing the API.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_AUTH_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: The username for accessing the API using basic authentication.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_USERNAME

environmentVariables.description: The password for accessing the API using basic authentication.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_PASSWORD

environmentVariables.description: The base URL of the DocSpace OAuth service for OAuth requests.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_OAUTH_BASE_URL

environmentVariables.description: The client ID of the OAuth application.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID

environmentVariables.description: The client secret of the OAuth application.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET

environmentVariables.description: The algorithm to use for signing OAuth access tokens.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_OAUTH_AUTH_TOKEN_ALGORITHM

environmentVariables.description: The time-to-live (TTL) for OAuth access tokens in milliseconds.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_OAUTH_AUTH_TOKEN_TTL

environmentVariables.description: The secret key to use for signing OAuth access tokens.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_OAUTH_AUTH_TOKEN_SECRET_KEY

environmentVariables.description: The algorithm to use for signing OAuth state tokens.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_OAUTH_STATE_TOKEN_ALGORITHM

environmentVariables.description: The time-to-live (TTL) for OAuth state tokens in milliseconds.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_OAUTH_STATE_TOKEN_TTL

environmentVariables.description: The secret key to use for signing OAuth state tokens.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_OAUTH_STATE_TOKEN_SECRET_KEY

environmentVariables.description: The base URL of the server.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_BASE_URL

environmentVariables.description: The host to bind the server to.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_HOST

environmentVariables.description: The port to bind the server to.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_PORT

environmentVariables.description: The number of proxy servers between the server and the client.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_PROXY_HOPS

environmentVariables.description: The list of allowed origins to include in the Access-Control-Allow-Origin header for CORS requests to MCP endpoints.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_CORS_MCP_ORIGIN

environmentVariables.description: The maximum age in milliseconds to include in the Access-Control-Max-Age header for CORS requests to MCP endpoints.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_CORS_MCP_MAX_AGE

environmentVariables.description: The list of allowed origins to include in the Access-Control-Allow-Origin header for CORS requests to OAuth endpoints.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_CORS_OAUTH_ORIGIN

environmentVariables.description: The maximum age in milliseconds to include in the Access-Control-Max-Age header for CORS requests to OAuth endpoints.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_CORS_OAUTH_MAX_AGE

environmentVariables.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per window for the MCP endpoints.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_MCP_CAPACITY

environmentVariables.description: The time window in milliseconds for the rate limit for the MCP endpoints.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_MCP_WINDOW

environmentVariables.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per window for the OAuth server metadata endpoint.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_SERVER_METADATA_CAPACITY

environmentVariables.description: The time window in milliseconds for the rate limit for the OAuth server metadata endpoint.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_SERVER_METADATA_WINDOW

environmentVariables.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per window for the OAuth resource metadata endpoint.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_RESOURCE_METADATA_CAPACITY

environmentVariables.description: The time window in milliseconds for the rate limit for the OAuth resource metadata endpoint.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_RESOURCE_METADATA_WINDOW

environmentVariables.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per window for the OAuth authorization endpoint.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_AUTHORIZE_CAPACITY

environmentVariables.description: The time window in milliseconds for the rate limit for the OAuth authorization endpoint.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_AUTHORIZE_WINDOW

environmentVariables.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per window for the OAuth callback endpoint.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_CALLBACK_CAPACITY

environmentVariables.description: The time window in milliseconds for the rate limit for the OAuth callback endpoint.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_CALLBACK_WINDOW

environmentVariables.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per window for the OAuth introspection endpoint.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_INTROSPECT_CAPACITY

environmentVariables.description: The time window in milliseconds for the rate limit for the OAuth introspection endpoint.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_INTROSPECT_WINDOW

environmentVariables.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per window for the OAuth client registration endpoint.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_REGISTER_CAPACITY

environmentVariables.description: The time window in milliseconds for the rate limit for the OAuth client registration endpoint.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_REGISTER_WINDOW

environmentVariables.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per window for the OAuth token revocation endpoint.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_REVOKE_CAPACITY

environmentVariables.description: The time window in milliseconds for the rate limit for the OAuth token revocation endpoint.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_REVOKE_WINDOW

environmentVariables.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per window for the OAuth token endpoint.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_TOKEN_CAPACITY

environmentVariables.description: The time window in milliseconds for the rate limit for the OAuth token endpoint.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_TOKEN_WINDOW

environmentVariables.description: The flag that indicates whether the server should accept configuration via query parameters in incoming requests.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_REQUEST_QUERY

environmentVariables.description: The flag that indicates whether the server should check for the Authorization header in incoming requests.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_REQUEST_AUTHORIZATION_HEADER

environmentVariables.description: The prefix to use with custom configuration headers.
environmentVariables.name: DOCSPACE_REQUEST_HEADER_PREFIX

headers.description: The flag that indicates whether the MCP server should use meta tools.
headers.name: X-Mcp-Dynamic

headers.description: The list of toolsets to enable for the MCP server.
headers.name: X-Mcp-Toolsets

headers.description: The list of tools to enable for the MCP server.
headers.name: X-Mcp-Enabled-Tools

headers.description: The list of tools to disable for the MCP server.
headers.name: X-Mcp-Disabled-Tools

headers.description: The base URL of the DocSpace instance for API requests.
headers.name: X-Mcp-Base-Url

headers.description: The API key for accessing the API.
headers.name: X-Mcp-Api-Key

headers.description: The Personal Access Token (PAT) for accessing the API.
headers.name: X-Mcp-Auth-Token

headers.description: The username for accessing the API using basic authentication.
headers.name: X-Mcp-Username

headers.description: The password for accessing the API using basic authentication.
headers.name: X-Mcp-Password
